Response Check User Kyc Requirements Endpoint Api Vender Check Kyc  Shopid  Get

patch.description:
Update vendor's KYC level requirement

Example:
- Set KYC level to 0 (No KYC): PATCH /api/vender/kyc-level/shop123?kyc_level=0
- Set KYC level to 1 (Bank account): PATCH /api/vender/kyc-level/shop123?kyc_level=1
- Set KYC level to 2 (Bank account + Real name): PATCH /api/vender/kyc-level/shop123?kyc_level=2
- Set KYC level to 3 (Bank account + ID card): PATCH /api/vender/kyc-level/shop123?kyc_level=3
- Set KYC level to 4 (Bank account + ID card + Real name): PATCH /api/vender/kyc-level/shop123?kyc_level=4

schema.title: Shopid
Kyc Level
Response Update Kyc Level Api Vender Kyc Level  Shopid  Patch

post.description:
Register an existing wallet as a hot wallet.
- **address**: [wallet address]
- **private_key**: [private key of the wallet]
- **walletname**: [wallet identifier, must be unique]
- **mainnet**: [TRON/ETH/BNB] (default: TRON)
- **remark**: [optional description]

※ SYSTEM ADMIN ONLY

schema.title: Response Register Hot Wallet Api Wallet Register Hot Wallet Post

Transfer USDT to the specified address
- **dealerid**: [dealer_id]
- **from_address**: [sender address]

※ SYSTEM ADMIN ONLY

post.summary: [SYSTEM ADMIN ONLY] Auto Transfer from Hot Wallet
post.description:
Automatically select the appropriate hot wallet and transfer the specified amount to the specified address.
- **dealerid**: [dealer ID]
- **to_address**: [recipient address]
- **amount**: [amount to send]
- **token_type**: [TRX/USDT] (default: USDT)
- **description**: [optional description]

※ SYSTEM ADMIN ONLY

schema.title: Response Auto Transfer Api Wallet Auto Transfer Post

get.description:
Dynamically estimate the transaction fee based on the current state of the Tron network. - **token_type**: token type to send (TRX or USDT) - required - **to_address**: receiver wallet address (optional) - **amount**: amount to send (optional) - **from_address**: sender wallet address (optional) The fee is returned in TRX, and it can vary depending on the current network situation. Providing address and amount information will yield a more accurate fee estimate.
※ SYSTEM ADMIN ONLY

schema.title: Token Type
To Address
Amount
From Address
Response Estimate Fee Api Wallet Estimate Fee Get
